content: > this pattern is available for ** free on my blog here 1 ** the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including pattern notes stitch guide written instructions and links to the video tutorials in one printable file without advertisements **materials** you will need 4 colors of scheepjes catona 50g/125m yarn and 2 mandala rings to make the mandalas the samples shown use these colors and yarn amounts * 1 x petal peach 263 colour a * 1 x rich coral 410 colour b * 1 x tropic 253 colour c * 1 x light navy 164 colour d you will also need 2 rings to finish the mandalas you will need rings with diameter 20cm 10″ and 15cm 6″ we make the mandalas using a 3mm crochet hook **yarn kits** all materials are available as a kit here 2 **size** the finished mandalas are 25cm 10″ and 15cm 6″ in diameter the metal rings help to stabilize the mandala s and make it possible to hang them on a wall **languages** the written patterns are available in english us terms english uk terms and dutch the video tutorials are available in english us terms **free and paid pattern** on my blog there is a free version of the pattern here on ravelry you can purchase a single pdf file which contains the pattern in one file as well as the links to the video tutorials **the small print** due to the nature of patterns this pattern may not be returned or exchanged all sales are final this pattern may not be redistributed or copied in any way finished items may be sold i just ask that you give credit to me esther dijkstra from it s all in a nutshell for the pattern i hope you love these mandalas as much as i do kind regards esther blog https //itsallinanutshell com/ facebook https //www facebook com/itsallinanutshell/ youtube https //www youtube com/itsallinanutshell copyright c 2023 esther dijkstra -
